name: Stories of Andora - Episode I
description:
STORIES OF ANDORA - EPISODE IDiscover a beautiful journey about a girl looking for her father.
Jump in the adventure of Andora, a magical place and seek the truth behind the stories.
  • Complex characters
  • Varied environment
  • A classic RPG story teller.
  • Beautiful soundtrack
  • Turned based combat system
  • Powerful artifacts
  • Mysterious villains
  • Popular engine
How to play:

Keyboard

  • Arrows to move around
  • Press Space bar to interract with objects and characters
  • Press Escape for inventory,save or quit
  • F1 to change the resolution

PS - Controller

  • Left Analog to move around
  • Press O to interract with objects and characters
  • Press X for inventory,save and quit.
  • F1 to change the resolution

Xbox - Controller

  • Left Analog to move around
  • Press B to interract with objects and characters
  • Press A for inventory,save and quit.
  • F1 to change the resolution
Minimum System Requirements:
  • OS Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7/ 8 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • CPU Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • RAM 512 MB or more
  • HDD 400 MB or more free space
  • Other 1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution

Supported Languages: English
